Entries.Fri.000: Handling salty fish all day makes me real thirsty.
Entries.spring_9.001: Eh, I got a fish hook stuck in my thumb... maybe I find something in the shop that helps removing it.
Entries.winter_17.000: Ah, nothin' like a hot beverage to wind down after a cold, dark dayâ€¦ and what a dark day it was.
Entries.spring_9.000: I have an appointment with a salty fella today, so if you need to buy anything you'd better hurry.
Entries.spring_9.003: I need a little warm-me-up to be ready for another cold night on the ocean.$h
Entries.Sat.000: Ah... Nothing's better than kicking back with a cold one after a successful day on the ocean.$h
Entries.winter_15.000: I can't get me a good night's sleep with that night market going on... eh, but that's okay. Maybe there are some sketchy people around.
Entries.winter.000: I need a little warm-me-up to be ready for another cold night out on the ocean.$h
Entries.winter_16.000: Have you been on the deep-sea submarine? The captain's an old friend.

Entries.Potat_Crash: I heard the crash all the way from my boat!
Entries.Introduction: Ahoy there! It's nice to see young folk movin' to the valley. It's not very common these days.
Entries.accept_869: Ah... That's the perrrrfect bait for a catfish I've been tryin' to catch!#$b#Here, let me trade you this for it. I'm not sure what it is, but it washed up on the beach not too long ago.#$b#Somethin' tells me you could use it, lad.^Somethin' tells me you could use it, miss.
Entries.FullCrabPond: *sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?#$b#Yer a man after me own heart, @. Hah!$h^Yer a lady after me own heart, @. Hah!$h#$b#Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast! [797]
Entries.MovieInvitation: Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, lad.^Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, miss.#$b#I'll just finish up around here, and head over.
Entries.Mon: Ahoy there, son.^Ahoy there, lass.#$b#Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?
Entries.Mon4: Have you had much luck in the local waters? You look like you could be a strong angler if you set your mind to it.
Entries.Tue: A true angler has respect for the water... don't you forget that. Respect the SEA!
Entries.Tue6: The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.#$e#The life at sea is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.
Entries.Wed: Some fish come and go with the seasons. Others only come out at night or in the rain.
Entries.Thu: *mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but I'm thinking about my late wife.
Entries.Thu2: There's rumors of some very rare fish in these parts... but only an experienced angler could stand a chance against them.#$e#You'll need the finest bait you can get if you want a rare fish to bite.
Entries.Fri: If you really want to get the fish biting, make sure you put some bait on your hook.
Entries.Sat: Did you met Buoy yet?#$e#I found him lost in the sea and adopted him. A lovely lad.
Entries.Sat8: How's the fishing life going for ya?#$e#I try to fish as often as possible, but it's not easy when you've got a shop to run.
Entries.Sun: If you purchase a high quality fishing rod, you'll be able to attach bait and tackle to the line.#$b#Bait causes fish to bite faster. Tackle can make your job a lot easier when reeling fish in.#$e#There's all kinds of tackle, with different perks. They're usually a little flimsy, so don't be surprised if your tackle breaks after a while.
Entries.Sun10: Hey, it's my skipper, @!$h#$e#I'd give you a discount on bait if I could afford it.$s
